parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To feed, satisfy, fatten. From chortos; to fodder, i.e. to gorge.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
Twelve; the usual way in which the Twelve apostles of Jesus are referred to. From duo and deka; two and ten, i.e. A dozen.
A large basket. Of uncertain derivation; a basket.
A fragment, broken piece. From klao; a piece.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: From perissos; to superabound, be in excess, be superfluous; also to cause to superabound or excel.
